sentence.Network_en: He rented out his house while he worked abroad.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在国外工作期间把自己的房子租了出去。

sentence.Network_en: He also collects things for the house on his travels abroad.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在国外旅游时也为家宅搜集物品作为摆设。

sentence.Network_en: Most of those who left the province to work abroad were unskilled.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些离开该省出国打工的人大部分都未经专门训练。

entry.def: If you go abroad, you go to a foreign country, usually one which is separated from the country where you live by an ocean or a sea.

example.ex: I would love to go abroad this year, perhaps to the South of France.
example.tran: 我今年很想出国，可能是去法国南部。

entry.tran: 在四下流传;广为流传地
entry.def: If there is a story or feeling abroad, people generally know about it or feel it.

example.ex: There'll still be a feeling abroad that this change has to be recognised.
example.tran: 人们还会普遍觉得这项变革早晚得接受。

means.word_mean: 1. to or in a foreign country;
2. far away from home or one's usual surroundings;

sentences.sentence: "looking afield for new lands to conquer"- R.A.Hall

means.word_mean: 3. in a place across an ocean

auth_sentence.content: Others want to use it to support communities abroad.
auth_sentence.res_content: Others want to use it to support communities abroad.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Others want to use it to support communities abroad.

auth_sentence.content: But reaction abroad to his speech has been mixed.
auth_sentence.res_content: But reaction abroad to his speech has been mixed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But reaction abroad to his speech has been mixed.

auth_sentence.content: They assaulted him because he sent some images abroad.
auth_sentence.res_content: They assaulted him because he sent some images abroad.

往国外, 到处, 海外
stems_affixes.word_buile: a=at+broad宽广→在宽广的地方→在海外
broad宽广+cast投射→n.广播, 播音
broadcast[n.广播, 播音]+ing状态→n.广播

Sentence.sentence: They value the environmental quality they preserve over their oil imports from abroad.
By 1973, domestic US sources of oil were peaking, and the nation was importing more of its oil, depending on a constant flow from abroad to keep cars on the road and machines running.
Compressing everything into three years also leaves less time for growing up, engaging in extracurricular activities, and studying abroad.

sentences.en: All my near relations live abroad.
sentences.cn: 我所有的近亲都在国外。

sentences.en: The young people were still abroad at the dead of night.
sentences.cn: 这些年轻人深更半夜还在外边。

jushi.english: I used to walk abroad after supper.
jushi.chinese: 从前在晚饭后我通常在外边散散步。

jushi.english: Though I have stayed abroad for a few decades,I have always been concerned about my motherland.
jushi.chinese: 虽然我在国外住了几十年,我还是常常怀念祖国。

jushi.english: All my near relations live abroad.
jushi.chinese: 我所有的近亲都住在国外。
